sentences.sContent: the intellectual superiority of humans over other animals
sentences.sCn: 人类相比其他动物所具有的智力优势

sentences.sContent: ...the superiority of the "Mona Lisa" to Leonardo's other works resulted from the cumulative advantage...

exam.question: There is no doubt that the ______ of these goods to the others is easy to see.

answer.explain: 句意： 毫无疑问， 与其他货物相比， 这些货物的优越性显而易见。prestige： 声望； priority： 优先权； publicity： 公开。

phrases.pCn: 空中优势；空优战斗机；空优
优越感；自尊情结；过于自尊

words.tran: 上级的；优秀的，出众的；高傲的
上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者

trans.tranOther: the quality of being better, more skilful, more powerful etc than other people or things
